pkgmetadata.longdescription: # scs_host_posixHost abstractions for data consumers running POSIX-compliant operating systems, including Windows 10._Contains library classes only._**Required libraries:** * Third party (always required): AWSIoTPythonSDK, tzlocal* Third party (to enable OSIO data access) paho-mqtt, pycurl* SCS root: scs_core**Branches:**The stable branch of this repository is master. For deployment purposes, use: git clone --branch=master https://github.com/south-coast-science/scs_host_posix.git
